articles.description: Barcelona and Real Madrid have both been keeping tabs on Martinez's situation in Italy, with the former eyeing the Argentine as a long-term replacement for Luis Suarez
articles.content:
Former Inter Milan and Barcelona star Luis Suarez has urged Lautaro Martinez to stay put with the Italian giants.
Martinez has been in blistering form for the Italian giants this season, having arri… [+2156 chars]
